Class java.lang.invoke.MethodHandles

Added Methods
MethodHandle collectArguments(MethodHandle, int, MethodHandle) Adapts a target method handle by pre-processing a sub-sequence of its arguments with a filter (another method handle).
Member reflectAs(Class<T>, MethodHandle) Performs an unchecked "crack" of a direct method handle.
